name: Pico de Gallo
briefdescription: This quick and easy fresh pico de gallo is made with red onion, minced jalapeno, lime juice, and seasonings for added flavor. Great as an appetizer or addition to any meal.

ingredients: 1 pinch ground cumin, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

instructions: Stir tomatoes, onion, cilantro, jalapeño pepper, lime juice, garlic, garlic powder, cumin, salt, and pepper together in a bowl.

comments.comment: This was great!!! My entire family loved it even my 6 yr old
